title: How to Make Chicken Sotanghon

steps.headline: Debone chicken meat and then shred.
On a wok, heat 3 tablespoons of cooking oil.
steps.description: Then sautée onions and garlic. After that, sauté the red bell pepper together with the shredded chicken.

steps.headline: Seasoned with dark soy sauce, salt and achuete (separate the seeds, add only the soak).
steps.description: Wait for the stock to boil until you put in the cabbage.

steps.headline: Mix the ingredients all together.
steps.description: You know that its already done when the sotanghon absorbed the color and the flavor of the stock. Also, check if the cabbage is cooked well.

steps.headline: Evaluate the product.
steps.description: The result shall not be watery. It should just be moist enough, just a like an ordinary pasta dish.

text: Boil chicken until cooked.  Debone chicken meat and then shred. Set aside the shredded chicken. On a wok, heat 3 tablespoons of cooking oil. Then sautée onions and garlic. After that, sauté the red bell pepper together with the shredded chicken. Add the chicken stock.  Seasoned with dark soy sauce, salt and achuete (separate the seeds, add only the soak). Wait for the stock to boil until you put in the cabbage. Add the sotanghon (vermicelli).  Mix the ingredients all together. You know that its already done when the sotanghon absorbed the color and the flavor of the stock. Also, check if the cabbage is cooked well. Evaluate the product. The result shall not be watery. It should just be moist enough, just a like an ordinary pasta dish. Finished.
